pkgmetadata.longdescription: WebLogo (https://github.com/WebLogo/weblogo) is a tool for creating sequencelogos from biological sequence alignments. It can be run on the command line,as a standalone webserver, as a CGI webapp, or as a python library.The main WebLogo webserver is located at http://weblogo.threeplusone.comPlease consult the manual for installation instructions and more information:./weblogo/htdocs/manual.html(Also located at http://weblogo.threeplusone.com/manual.html.)
